snippet.title: Elmo's Number Journey | Playstation Longplay
snippet.description:
In Elmo's Number Journey, Elmo, has to help out Ernie, Cookie Monster, and Count Von Count to collect a specific number. 

A bonus stage is also available where Elmo must do simple addition or subtraction by throwing balls into the mouth of a massive clown muppet head.

I used to watch a lot of Sesame Street on my Saturday mornings as a kid. Although this game is very linear and does not offer much for adults, it's an enjoyable educational game for kids who love to play as Elmo and meet some of the show's main characters in-game.

Played on the ePSXe, rendered with Sony Vegas Pro 13.

Say hi in the comments below!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
